attributes.action: Resign due to the government's inability to control immigration, and ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the decision to give early release to prisoners, rather than build more prisons The inability to control Government spending, with particular regard to MP's expenses.
the governments failure to give the public  a referendum on the so called EU Treaty,
the failure of the goverment to provide an effective police force, ie one not tied down by paperwork

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Decision2008/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
